# showsTimecodes

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the player view displays timecodes, if available.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var showsTimecodes: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `false`.

## Configuring presentation

- **showsPlaybackControls**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the player view controller shows playback controls.
- **contentOverlayView**: A view that displays between the video content and the playback controls.
- **videoGravity**: A string that specifies how the video displays within the bounds of the view controller’s view.
- **videoBounds**: The size and position of the video image within the bounds of the view controller’s view.
- **appliesPreferredDisplayCriteriaAutomatically**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the view controller automatically sets the screen’s display criteria to match that of the currently playing asset.
